name: Mermaid Warrior
description:
This is a game designed for the Unity Jr programmer Game Jam.

You are a small mermaid warrior living in the sea and trying to fight against wastes.

Just click/drag your mouse to collect only wastes! (Cans and Milk boxes. If you collect waste bins then you will lose score). 

The Rainbow Pill is your energy boost and it will give you a 100 score! 

Enjoy!
